title: Misinformation about Israel and Hamas is spreading on social media
description: As one of the largest invasions in 50 years unfolded on the streets, sea and skies over Israel, misinformation about the assault proliferated on social media.

title: Sex, Signal messages and sabotage: SBF’s top execs and Bahamas roommates tell all in court
description: Two of Sam Bankman-Fried’s former friends from MIT, who also worked at crypto exchange FTX while living with the company’s founder in the Bahamas, took the stand in a Manhattan courtroom this week.

title: Hamas says it has taken ‘dozens’ of Israelis hostage
description: Hamas has taken "dozens" of Israeli soldiers hostage and moved them to the Gaza Strip, the militant group’s military wing said Saturday, hours after it launched a deadly land, air and sea attack and fired a huge barrage of rockets at Israel.

title: Grandmother wakes to rockets and children crying as Hamas attacks
description: She was supposed to be celebrating her 75th birthday Saturday. But instead, Bracha Yarkoni watched as her home in southern Israel, was hit by a rocket.

title: Richard Engel: Hamas' Israeli hostages 'are effectively human shields'
description: The spokesperson for the Israeli Defense Force has confirmed that Israeli civilians and soldiers have been taken hostage in Gaza by Hamas. NBC News' Richard Engel discuses the ongoing crisis, and how the use of hostages will complicate the conflict as it unfolds.

title: Israel and Gaza Conflict in Photos
description: Israel descended into chaos on Saturday after Palestinian militants fired thousands of rockets and sent scores of fighters into towns lining the Gaza Strip — an unprecedented assault that drew fierce condemnation from political leaders around the world.

title: 2024 GOP presidential contenders blame Biden for Hamas attacks on Israel
description: Republican 2024 presidential candidates blamed the Biden administration for the attacks Hamas terrorists launched against Israel on Saturday, pointing to the deadly developments as evidence of U.S. weakness on the world stage and claiming that the administration is partially responsible.

title: Hamas surprise attack on Israel: What is the objective?
description: NBC's Andrea Mitchell joins analysis TODAY with analysis after the Hamas militant group launched a surprise attack on Israel by land, sea and air on Saturday. "It is sheer terrorism and certainly according to the Israelis," she says. "Nothing on this scale has ever been contemplated, this is not something the Israeli government was prepared for."

title: Hamas says it has taken Israeli hostages in surprise attack
description: The Hamas military group claims it has taken Israelis as hostages back into the Gaza Strip during its surprise attack on Israel. NBC News’ Raf Sanchez reports on the ground where the conflict’s death toll stands at 22 but is expected to rise.

title: Recording raises new questions about police response to fatal crash involving Sen. Bob Menendez's wife
description: Recordings raises new questions about how law enforcement officials investigated a 2018 fatal crash involving New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez's future wife.
